Topic.Title: yahoo's P/E IS ONLY 5.6 . ARE WE 6 MONTHS BEHIND ???

Message.Msg: More to the point, Yahoo’s price-to-earnings ratio remains unusually low — it’s 5.6, compared to the S&P’s 14.2 average — which means that the entire business is severely undervalued by Wall Street.

Topic.Title: Has Yahoo's $3.6B stock buyback started yet?

Message.Msg: Yahoo announced a $3 billion buyback in 2010 and a $5 billion buyback in May 2012. Yahoo has spent a few billion on buybacks since the 2010 announcement and that continues. No $3.6 billion buyback has been announced.
